cab.content: secR E T.22?$ BATTLE SITUATION - KOiN - 28th JTIKS, 1918.-ft v siwmim front..7/e carried out a minor operation E. of ROBSCQ early this morning. No details of this operation have been received yet but it is believed that all objectives were captured and. our line advanced to an average depth of 1500 yards on a 6000^yard front. Number of prisoners captured is not yet known.The Erench carried out an operation this morning S. of tho AISNS in the neighbourhood of FoSSE-SN-BaS and CUTRY. Their line now runs as follows :- F0SSE*3N-BAS - 1 kilometre N.W. of CUTRY, 2 kilometres 8. of CUTRY - western outskirts of ST PIERRE - AIGLS.I1ALIAH FRONT.The situation is unchanged and there is nothing of special interest to report.General Staff,War Office, S.W.I. 28th June, 1918.Issued at 12.45 p.m.
